conversations.chat_name: Urban Joy Berlin 🎊🎉 conscious & bliss events with Joe & friends

messages.name: joejung
messages.content:
Passt 1 der Angebote zu Dir!? Zum Beispiel:

• Suche Handwerker &/oder Bauleiter für Hausausbauprojekt @olgav0lga

• nach Terminvereinbarung ☆ Coaching zu Selbstliebe, Innerem Kind, emotionalem Frieden, TraumaRelease, Abgrenzung | @JoeJung

Weitere Angebote unter:
lists.urbanjoy.de

✨🏅🎉 Wie können unsere Community-Listen Dir heute helfen?🎊🎁

• Wohnen/WGs/Mitbewohner
• Services/Jobs/Angebote
• Families & Kids
• Community Anfragen/Gesuche allgemein 

Inklusive Filterfunktion auf der 1ten Bildschirmseite.

Schaut rein, posted, teilt und lasst uns einander helfen, Fähigkeiten nutzen und Möglichkeiten erschaffen!!

Wir bauen schrittweise alle Verbesserungen ein, die sich zeigen!! Schreibt uns gern

Liebe Grüße, Joe & Team

messages.name: joejung
messages.content:
Ihr Lieben 
Let's play!!

• 19.12. | 19:00-20:30+ | Authentic Relating Games Night über den Dächern der Stadt 🧸🎁🎯 💝

Für 90 Minuten+ werden wir uns bewusst & spielerisch der Verbindung mit uns selbst und anderen widmen

Unity Dome
Charlottenstr. 63
10117 Berlin

Warum lieben wir ARGs so sehr❓️
Weil sie Tiefe & Leichtigkeit verbinden❗️ 
urbanjoy.de/authentic

Mit entspannender & achtsamer Zuwendung in Einzel- und Gruppenübungen dürfen wir Verbundenheit, Nähe & Distanz, Erholung, Liebesenergie und vielleicht wo nötig/möglich Heilsame Momente erfahren.

✨️ Vertiefe Deine Beziehung zu Dir selbst & anderen
✨️ Erlebe Deine Zartheit  & Stärke in Verbundenheit
✨️ Genieße fühlendes Sein & Handeln 
✨️ Erweitere Deine Fähigkeit, emotional präsent und berührbar zu sein
✨️ Fühl Dich noch mehr Zuhause & geborgen in Dir & mit (neuen) Freunden 

🌇🌃 Beitrag für Ort & Orga 
Solo 23Eur
Duo/Trio 20Eur pro Person -

Anmeldung via PM an @JoeJung

More Community News:
https://t.me/+RbIHh7o-EZXFFAPI

messages.name: joejung
messages.content:

www.urbanjoy.de/xmas

messages.name: kaIiope
messages.content: If it’s welfare laundry then welfare should pay for it? Or did you also wash harlot items? I’m confused 😉

messages.name: amiamyberlin
messages.content:
There were ripped and dirty trash bags full of bedding in my basement labeled "dirty" "to wash" so I washed them.  They were not labeled with any other labels. I spent 85€ of my own money to wash them.

I do not have more information than that. 

So if someone could figure this out and I could get my money, that would be great 👍😃

messages.name: amiamyberlin
messages.content: I don't think it's fair to me to expect me to remember text conversations I had 5 months ago. More clear labels would have been helpful.

Two tickets to the Corvus Corax concert in Berlin tomorrow to sell or give away or trade (they cost me 70 euros total, but choose according to your ability).

I live in Brandenburg though & they’re physical tickets, so only convenient way to get them is to meet me at the Charlottenberg Christmas markt tonight between 18:30 and 19:30.

Text me directly on telegram if interested, otherwise I’ll be trying to barter them away for christmas gifts I guess.

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
Last reminder: Burner Sauna - Zum schwitzenden Bären tonight at 6 at Studio DB, Wedding. Don‘t forget to bring a funny „Wichtel present“ if you want to take part in the big Wichtel Battle. Also our hots let‘s you know: there will be festive food at a fair price: French cheese, oysters and bubbles.
And not to forget: Agro Yoga for all levels

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
Yes, the rumours are true: in 2025 "Zum Brennenden Bären" strikes  back!!!
After a three-year hibernation, ZZB (Burning Bear) is back—and this time, it’s double the fun! In 2025, we’re thrilled to bring you two events: a winter burn from March 13–16 at the beloved Schloss Beesenstedt 🏰 and a summer burn in mid-September at our sparkling new treasure 🤫

‼️Yes, we found it: our new home‼️
Our new location which we will reveal soon is the uncut rough diamond 💎 we’ve spent years searching for! It’s a place full of history. It has trizillion tons of space to realize our wildest dreams. By 2026 the new location will also be winter-ready, so we plan to make it our winter residency. However, we want to show how colourful, creative and wild we are. This is why we are doing our first event in September and we really need you to join forces.

This project only works if we collaborate like burners do and we are ready to invest a lot of love ❤️ and resources into this project. Soon you will be able to pre-register and start working on whatever project you come up with.
Here are some teasers before the great reveal. An old prison in the basement?! Check! Rooms even more impressive than Beesenstedt’s ballroom!? Check! A lake?! Check! Light-flooded rooms?! Check! We could go on like forever, or in short: we‘re in love 🥰

Winter is too cold 🥶 and September is too far?!
We got you covered. So, what’s a bear 🐻 to do in the meantime? Hibernate for another winter? No way! After much thoughtful discussion and a democratic vote, the majority decided: we’re heading back to Schloss Beesenstedt - our cozy but imperfect den under the big chandeliers.
Yes, the reasons we left haven’t changed. It’s pricey, and not everyone loves the "plug-and-play" vibe. We’ve heard those voices, loud and clear. But no other venue gives us the creative freedom to make winter magic quite like Beesenstedt. Sure, we said: it‘s over. We said: „Ciao Cacao“ and „last dance“, but we got an offer we could not refuse.

And be honest: who of you never had sex with their ex?
Let’s work together to make this burn as inclusive as possible.
 Because whether you’re a grizzly 🐻 , a panda 🐼 , or a teddy 🧸 , everyone deserves to experience the Burn’s warmth and joy.  The details: Our membership lottery kicks off in the first weeks of January, so don’t wait—sign up now for your membership. The registration form will remain open until December 31st. One last hurrah in Beesenstedt, and then—onward to new horizons! The adventure is calling, and we can’t wait to share it with all of you. #PawPower is back!
